articles.author: Joel Stein
articles.title: Hollywood Ghostwriters Tell All (Including Their Names) - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: You don’t know their names and you certainly wouldn’t recognize their faces — even if their eyes weren’t shaded out — but chances are you’ve read stacks and stacks of their books. THR sits down with six of the top ghostwriters in the celebrity memoir business.
articles.content: One of the ghostwriter’s most valuable skills is getting their subjects to talk. So, when I gathered L.A.’s most successful ghostwriters at the Formosa Cafe to gossip, they knew all my tricks. In des… [+20465 chars]
